Attributes.description: Introductory genomics in the context of genetics and epigenetics; current and topical issues, including genetic determinism, environmental DNA, revival of extinct species, and applications of genomics to improve our life and environment including adaptation to climate change.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 11:00, End Time: 12:30, Building: Robert, Room: F.
